rules_text:
Flying, first strike, lifelink
Whenever a tapped Soldier or Vehicle creature you control dies, Black Knight’s Ares deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Crew 4
notes:
2.2.0: Can’t make ether cylinders anymore. Was too much text for not enough effect.
2.2.1: Changed to the Black Knight’s Ares (name will be changed probably when we know more) and given flying instead of menace so that the poggers ares could have menace instead
